footer.motto:
A new type of navigation application
that can be used on railroad lines throughout Japan

welcome.canBeUsed: Can be used on railroad lines throughout Japan
welcome.description:
It has never been possible to use a train LCD with your smartphone.
That's TrainLCD, a new kind of navigation app!
When you feel lost, when you are not sure if you can get off the train. It will surely be useful for you.

serviceArea.description: With a few exceptions, most of Japan's nationwide Railroad lines are supported
serviceArea.disclaimer:
Service is not guaranteed for some routes where signal reception is difficult, such as subways, and for intricate routes such as the Tsurumi Line.
The service is only available for railroad lines and not for buses or other means of transportation

tablet.description:
With the iPad, you can find out the next station more easily.
The app is compatible with any of the latest iPads, so you can use it comfortably as soon as you download it.
You can download the app and start using it right away.
tablet.disclaimer: The Wi-Fi model iPad is not equipped with GPS and may become unstable under certain conditions.

appleWatch.description:
When combined with the Apple Watch
You can know where you are stopping and where you will be stopping next just by looking at your wrist.
and the station where the train will stop next.
appleWatch.disclaimer: Only Apple Watch is supported. Currently not compatible with Wear OS, etc.

oss.description:
TrainLCD is an MIT-licensed open source project.
Engineers, would you like to contribute to the development of TrainLCD?

dl.description:
It is compatible with iPhone, iPad, and Android smartphones, and of course it is free.
Get it working on your smartphone ASAP!
